column5: Not sure if any of you guys follow Seabass Outdoors .. he seems like a great guy and always puts out great information and videos ..
The under water footage is amazing cheers
Where can the Drifter be bought Seabass?
Order them direct from Set The Hook. The meegs catches way more. I"ve fished them both side by side, and the meegs is hands down the way to go.  Great video!  S.
Thanks for replying Sinker.I've had little luck with meegs , I love the old speader
this may help, most people dont realize this is the technique. Also RIP Kevin
Meegs,vibrado,williams and the GOBY FLYYYYYYYYYY NUFF SAID.
They all work.  Just depends on what the fish want that day
what size jig head do use for ice fishing the Drifter for white fish
I didn't see or hear any indication of the depth of water they were fishing, but if wind and current aren't a factor like thru the ice a 1/8th ounce head is probably fine on a 3 inch lure.
